title: Chocolate Chunk Muffins with Cocoa Nib Streusel Recipe
full_text:
Chocolate Chunk Muffins with Cocoa Nib Streusel Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Cook
20 mins
Active
10 mins
Cooling Time
5 mins
Total
35 mins
Makes
12 muffins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 3/4
cups
(about
8 1/2
ounces
)
all purpose flour
, plus
3
tablespoons
2
teaspoons
baking powder
1/2
teaspoon
baking soda
3/4
cup
sugar
1
cup
milk
1/3
cup
vegetable oil
1
egg
, beaten
3/4
cup
chocolate chunks
(
chopped chocolate
, or
large chocolate chips
)
3
tablespoons
butter
2
tablespoons
oats
2
tablespoons
brown sugar
1
tablespoon
roasted cocoa nibs
Directions
Adjust oven rack to middle position, and preheat to 375°F (190°C). Line a muffin tin with paper muffin tin liners. In a large bowl combine 1 3/4 cups flour, baking powder, baking soda, and sugar and whisk to combine. In a separate bowl combine milk, vegetable oil, and egg and whisk until well combined. Slowly whisk the milk-oil-egg mixture into the dry ingredients. Fold in chocolate chunks.
Add remaining 3 tablespoons butter, flour, oats, brown sugar, and cocoa nibs to a separate bowl. Using your fingers gently incorporate all the ingredients together until there are no loger any lumps of butter.
Divide batter between muffin cups, then top with streusel. Bake until muffins are brown and a toothpick inserted into center comes out clean, about 18 minutes. Remove from oven, let cool 5 minutes, and serve warm.
Special equipment
muffin tin, muffin liners
Muffins
Chocolate
Breakfast & Brunch
